alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 26 at 2:49PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW AND REDUCED VISIBILITY WILL AFFECT SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...LEWIS AND NORTHEASTERN OSWEGO COUNTIES... At 247 PM EST, an area of heavy snow with gusty winds and reduced visibility was tracking across the Tug Hill toward the Black River Valley into southern Lewis County. Locations impacted include... Sandy Island Beach State Park, Lowville, Pulaski, Adams, Redfield, Selkirk Shores State Park, Highmarket, Adams Center, Southwick Beach State Park, Henderson Harbor, Barnes Corners, Whetstone Gulf State Park, Richland, Denmark, New Bremen, Watson, Martinsburg, Henderson, Smithville and Lyonsdale. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 36 and 44. The snow may accumulate at a rate of up to one inch per hour in this area of heavy snow and visibilities may be sharply reduced to a half mile or less. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
